channel.title: jonathan-davis on Loud Legends
channel.description: Recent content in jonathan-davis on Loud Legends

item.title: The Surprise You Missed in Korn’s 1997 Track "A.D.I.D.A.S."
item.description: Jonathan Davis’s son Nathan can be heard cooing during the breakdown of Korn’s 1997 track “A.

item.title: Korn's Original Drummer David Silveria Opens Up on 30th Anniversary
item.description: David Silveria celebrates the 30th anniversary of Korn’s debut album with a nostalgic Instagram post.

item.title: KORN's Debut Album Turns 30: Jonathan Davis Reflects on the Band's Legacy
item.description: KORN celebrated the 30th anniversary of their self-titled debut album with a special concert at BMO Stadium in Los Angeles.

item.title: Phil Labonte: Korn’s Impact on Deathcore Goes Beyond Nu-Metal
item.description: Phil Labonte credits Korn with influencing the rise of deathcore through their innovative heavy sound.

item.title: Brian Welch on Korn's New Album: “The Heaviest in Years”
item.description: Korn’s guitarist Brian “Head” Welch claims the band’s upcoming music will be the heaviest they’ve produced in years.

item.title: Korn’s Creative Process: Ray Luzier Breaks Down the Band’s Approach
item.description: Ray Luzier praises Korn’s willingness to experiment, from dubstep collaborations to returning to analog recording.
